name: Waddle it Be?
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Howard Duckson → remove Waddle it Be? from the game.
• Remove and shuffle all Howard the Duck side schemes from the victory display into your deck. If no schemes were removed this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Duck and Cover!
text: Quack-tastrophe! Howard the Duck is in over his head once again. It's up to the heroes to save him from a group of interdimensional bounty hunters. When Revealed: Each player must discard cards with a printed [mental] from their hand. Place 1 additional threat here for each card discarded this way. [hazard]

name: Collector
text: Villainous. (When this minion activates, give it a boost card.) When Revealed: Discard an ally or support you control. If you cannot, put the topmost scheme from the encounter deck into play. (Howard the Duck's nemesis minion.)

name: Duck, Duck, Doom!
text: Doctor Bong has set up a trap to capture Howard the Duck. When Revealed: Place an ally you control beneath this card. If you cannot, confuse your identity. When Defeated: Return the ally beneath here to its owner's hand.

name: A Fowl Plot
text: The Collector plans to add Howard the Duck to his collection of rare and unique items. When Revealed: Discard an upgrade you control. If no cards were discarded this way, place 1 threat on the main scheme and take 1 damage. (Howard the Duck's nemesis side scheme.) [acceleration]

name: Duck Hunt
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The villain schemes. If there are side schemes in play, divide and place threat from this activation among them instead. When Revealed (Hero): Give the villain a tough status card. If you cannot, heal 3 damage from it instead.
